annotations.description: In the Grim Darkness of the 41st Millennium, there is only drink! I'm making the Space Wolves Favorite, Fenrisian Ale! Lemun Russ!!! I've played a good amoun...
annotations.title: Fenrisian Ale | How to Drink

textContent:
4 oz. -or- 120 ml. Viking Blod Mead
.25 oz. -or- 8 ml. Absinthe
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Everclear (optional)

Shake over Ice
Strain into single rocks glass

title: Fenrisian Ale
